short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detects Phone Numbers in Pages then makes them Clickable

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Phonehub Extensions makes Phone Numbers on pages Clickable... It can detect phone numbers inside form fields too!

This makes integrating your CRM easier than ever, Install the Extension... Setup the Phonehub Client on your machine and now your browser is fully integrated!

Currently Doesn't work without the Phonehub Client... Contact info@phonehub.com.au for information on how to setup... Or join the Phonehub Beta http://www.phonehub.com.au/beta
